sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
School Bus Performance Bond Act.

sections.heading: As used in this Act "School bus company" means and includes any
sections.text:
individual or business entity, regardless of its form of organization,
which transports pupils to or from any school under contract with the
parents of the pupils but does not include any regulated public utility or
any school-operated bus service.

sections.heading: Before any school bus company may begin the performance of any
sections.text:
contract for the transportation of pupils it must file with the
employing school board, cooperative, or joint agreement, if so requested
by the employer, a
bond assuring performance of the
contract by the school bus company.
